dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
AWS ParallelCluster is an AWS supported Open Source cluster management
tool to deploy and manage HPC clusters in the AWS cloud.
dependent_to.name: aws-parallelcluster

dependent_to.description: A python package with helper tools for the nf-core community.
dependent_to.name: nf-core-tools

dependent_to.description: Advanced Profiling and Analytics for AMD Hardware
dependent_to.name: omniperf

dependent_to.description:
PODIO, or plain-old-data I/O, is a C++ library to support the creation
and handling of data models in particle physics.
dependent_to.name: podio

dependent_to.description: Python package to automate ABINIT calculations and analyze the results.
dependent_to.name: py-abipy

dependent_to.description:
AlpacaFarm is a simulator that enables research and development on
learning from feedback at a fraction of the usual cost, promoting
accessible research on instruction following and alignment.
dependent_to.name: py-alpaca-farm

dependent_to.description:
Anvi’o is a comprehensive platform that brings together many aspects of
today’s cutting-edge computational strategies of data-enabled
microbiology, including genomics, metagenomics, metatranscriptomics,
pangenomics, metapangenomics, phylogenomics, and microbial population
genetics in an integrated and easy-to-use fashion through extensive
interactive visualization capabilities.
dependent_to.name: py-anvio

dependent_to.description: This is the python client for Arkouda.
dependent_to.name: py-arkouda

dependent_to.description:
An analysis tool providing insight into the portability and
maintainability of an application's source code.
dependent_to.name: py-codebasin

dependent_to.description: A command line interface for Databricks.
dependent_to.name: py-databricks-cli

dependent_to.description: JAX-based neural network library
dependent_to.name: py-dm-haiku

dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.
dependent_to.name: py-dvc

dependent_to.description: FireWorks stores, executes, and manages calculation workflows.
dependent_to.name: py-fireworks

dependent_to.description: Cloud-native genomic dataframes and batch computing (Python API)
dependent_to.name: py-hail

dependent_to.description: A Command-Line Interface framework.
dependent_to.name: py-knack

dependent_to.description:
A general purpose workflow conductor for running multi-step simulation
studies.
dependent_to.name: py-maestrowf

dependent_to.description: Merlin Workflow for HPC.
dependent_to.name: py-merlin

dependent_to.description:
Mikado is a lightweight Python3 pipeline whose purpose is to facilitate
the identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data * and to select
the best models in each locus.
dependent_to.name: py-mikado

dependent_to.description: MIM Installs OpenMMLab packages
dependent_to.name: py-openmim

dependent_to.description:
Python Materials Genomics is a robust materials analysis code that
defines core object representations for structures and molecules with
support for many electronic structure codes. It is currently the core
analysis code powering the Materials Project.
dependent_to.name: py-pymatgen

dependent_to.description:
PyNucleus is a finite element code that specifically targets nonlocal
operators.
dependent_to.name: py-pynucleus

dependent_to.description: Rucio Client Lite Package
dependent_to.name: py-rucio-clients

dependent_to.description:
SacreBLEU is a standard BLEU implementation that downloads and manages
WMT datasets, produces scores on detokenized outputs, and reports a
string encapsulating BLEU parameters, facilitating the production of
shareable, comparable BLEU scores.
dependent_to.name: py-sacrebleu

dependent_to.description:
A workflow library to easily integrate machine learning libraries with
high performance computing simulations and applications
dependent_to.name: py-smartsim

dependent_to.description: Box of handy tools for Sphinx.
dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-toolbox

dependent_to.description:
A collection of open source benchmarks used to evaluate PyTorch
performance.
dependent_to.name: py-torchbenchmark

dependent_to.description:
VCF-kit is a command-line based collection of utilities for performing
analysis on Variant Call Format (VCF) files.
dependent_to.name: py-vcf-kit

dependent_to.description: scalable pythonic model fitting for high energy physics
dependent_to.name: py-zfit

dependent_to.description:
ReFrame is a framework for writing regression tests for HPC systems. The
goal of this framework is to abstract away the complexity of the
interactions with the system, separating the logic of a regression test
from the low-level details, which pertain to the system configuration
and setup. This allows users to write easily portable regression tests,
focusing only on the functionality.
dependent_to.name: reframe

dependent_to.description: Advanced Profiling and Analytics for AMD Hardware
dependent_to.name: rocprofiler-compute

dependent_to.description:
Workflow management system to create reproducible and scalable data
analyses.
dependent_to.name: snakemake

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
